edu.thu.keg.mdap

Interface DataSetFactory


  • public interface DataSetFactory
    This object provides information about all datasets stored in the platform, including all suppliers. Metadata stored in all data providers are found here. This should be the main entrance of the framework
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataSet getDataSet(java.lang.String name)
      Get a dataset stored in the platform and return a reference.
      DataSet[] getDataSetList()
      Get all datasets stored in the platform

    • Method Detail

      • getDataSet

        DataSet getDataSet(java.lang.String name)
        Get a dataset stored in the platform and return a reference. It can be stored in all registered providers.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the requested dataset
        Returns:
        a reference of DataSet

      • getDataSetList

        DataSet[] getDataSetList()
        Get all datasets stored in the platform
        Returns:
        a array containing all the dataset references
